channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: インドの規制当局が、2021年に初めて発表されたソニー・インディアとジー・エンターテインメントの合併案を承認、メディア大国が誕生する（Georg Szalai/Hollywood Reporter）
item.description:
Georg Szalai / Hollywood Reporter:
Indian regulators approve the proposed merger between Sony India and Zee Entertainment, first unveiled in 2021, which will create a media powerhouse  —  The mega-deal has run into various hurdles since being unveiled in 2021. … It would bring together linear TV networks, digital businesses …

item.title: BBC NewsとBBC Soundsは6月下旬、ニュースキャスト・ポッドキャスト用にDiscordサーバーを立ち上げ、視聴者がニュースに影響を与えるようにした。
item.description:
Bron Maher / Press Gazette:
BBC News and BBC Sounds launched a Discord server in late June for the Newscast podcast, letting the audience influence the news; the server has 3,700 members  —  It's now over a month since BBC News' flagship podcast, Newscast, launched a server on Discord.

item.title: X、ブランドの安全性と広告主のコントロールを強化する「感度設定」と「拡張ブロックリスト」を発表、広告マネージャで今後数週間展開（Nicola Agius/Search Engine Land）
item.description:
Nicola Agius / Search Engine Land:
X unveils Sensitivity Settings and Enhanced Blocklist to boost brand safety and control for advertisers, rolling out over the next few weeks in the Ads Manager  —  The new tools give marketers more say over ad placement.  —  X, formerly known as Twitter, has launched two new features …

item.title: Foxの元幹部プレストン・パッデンは、FCCにFoxのフィラデルフィアでのFox29の運営免許更新を拒否するよう求める少数の声高な批判者たちに加わった（David Folkenflik/NPR）
item.description:
David Folkenflik / NPR:
Former Fox exec Preston Padden has joined a small band of vocal critics urging the FCC to deny Fox's renewal of its license to operate Fox 29 in Philadelphia  —  Preston Padden joined the Fox broadcast network a few years after its launch and helped founder Rupert Murdoch make it viable.

item.title: ボブ・アイガーは、ディズニー売却の可能性について「憶測で語ろうとする者は、直ちに世界の規制環境を考慮しなければならない」と語った（Lucas Manfredi/The Wrap）
item.description:
Lucas Manfredi / The Wrap:
Bob Iger says “anyone who wanted to speculate about” potential Disney sale “would have to immediately consider the global regulatory environment”  —  “Obviously anyone who wanted to speculate about such things would have to immediately consider the global regulatory environment …

item.title: ライオンズゲートが、eOneとの契約、ハリウッドのストライキ、「破壊的な市場」を理由に、ライオンズゲートとStarzの分割計画を2024年第1四半期に延期（Etan Vlessing/The Hollywood Reporter）
item.description:
Etan Vlessing / The Hollywood Reporter:
Lionsgate delays the planned split of Lionsgate and Starz to the first quarter of 2024, citing the eOne deal, Hollywood strikes, and a “disruptive marketplace”  —  The Hollywood giant, led by CEO Jon Feltheimer, has pushed the timing for a spin off of its studio business …

item.title: PE企業シンフォニー・テクノロジー・グループ、メディア編集ソフトメーカーAvidを14億ドルで買収合意：アビッドの製品は『トップガン：マーベリック』やその他の映画で使用されている。
item.description:
Reuters:
PE firm Symphony Technology Group agrees to acquire media editing software maker Avid for ~$1.4B; Avid's products were used in Top Gun: Maverick and other films  —  Private equity firm Symphony Technology Group (STG) on Wednesday agreed to buy media editing software maker Avid Technology Inc …

item.title: ボブ・アイガーによると、ディズニーは2023年のコンテンツ支出を270億ドルと予想しており、ハリウッドのストライキの影響もあり、従来の予想より30億ドルほど低い（Scott Mendelson/The Wrap）
item.description:
Scott Mendelson / The Wrap:
Bob Iger says Disney is expecting content spending in 2023 to be $27B, about $3B lower than previously guided, in part due to the Hollywood strikes  —  The company had previously expected to spend $30 billion this year  —  Walt Disney is cutting its content budget for the year by $3 billion …

item.title: iHeartMedia、Spotify、Acastのポッドキャスト収入は第2四半期に前年同期比12％～31％増、PwCは2023年のポッドキャスト広告収入総額を前年同期比25％増の22.8億ドルと予測（Sara Guaglione/Digiday）
item.description:
Sara Guaglione / Digiday:
Podcast revenue at iHeartMedia, Spotify, and Acast grew between 12% and 31% YoY in Q2; PwC projects total podcast ad revenue to grow 25% YoY to $2.28B in 2023  —  iHeartMedia, Spotify and Acast reported revenue growth between 12% and 31% year over year in their podcast businesses during …

item.title: ライオンズゲート、第1四半期の売上高は前年同期比1.6％増の$909M、予想$893M、純損失$70.7M、映画収入はJohn Wick: Chapter 4が牽引し46％増の$406.5M（Scott Mendelson/The Wrap）
item.description:
Scott Mendelson / The Wrap:
Lionsgate reports Q1 revenue up 1.6% YoY to $909M vs. $893M est., a $70.7M net loss, and Motion Picture revenue up 46% to $406.5M driven by John Wick: Chapter 4  —  Strong holdover box office from “John Wick: Chapter 4” and consistently strong TV and library business help the mini-major come out on top

item.title: 申請中：デイブ・ポートノイはペン・エンタテインメントからバースツール・スポーツを1ドルで買収、この買収で8億ドルから8億5,000万ドルの損失を計上する見込みだという。
item.description:
Alex Weprin / Hollywood Reporter:
Filing: Dave Portnoy acquired Barstool Sports for $1 from Penn Entertainment, which says it expects to record a loss of between $800M and $850M on the deal  —  Penn Entertainment estimates that it will take a loss of as much as $850 million on Barstool.  —  Just how much did Dave Portnoy pay …

item.title: ボブ・アイガーは、コードカットのトレンドは「紛れもないもの」であり、ディズニーはABCのようなリニアTV資産の「さまざまな戦略的選択肢」を検討していると述べている（Kayla Cobb/The Wrap）。
item.description:
Kayla Cobb / The Wrap:
Bob Iger says cord-cutting trends are “unmistakable” and Disney is considering “a variety of strategic options” for its linear TV assets such as ABC  —  Bob Iger says the company is “considering a variety of strategic options” for assets like ABC

item.title: ボブ・アイガーは、ディズニーはパスワード共有を取り締まる「積極的な方法を模索している」とし、「2024年中に収益化を推進する戦術を展開する」と述べた（Adam Chitwood/The Wrap）。
item.description:
Adam Chitwood / The Wrap:
Bob Iger says Disney is “actively exploring ways” to crack down on password sharing and “will roll out tactics to drive monetization sometime in 2024”  —  Disney+ will begin cracking down on password-sharing in 2024 in an effort to drive monetization …

item.title: CNETが古い記事を削除、「主にSEOトラフィックで動く」サイトのベストプラクティスと呼ぶ、GoogleはSEO向上のための削除は「あり得ない」（Thomas Germain/Gizmodo）
item.description:
Thomas Germain / Gizmodo:
CNET is deleting older posts, calling such cuts a best practice for sites “primarily driven by SEO traffic”; Google says purging to improve SEO is “not a thing”  —  Google says deleting old pages to bamboozle Search is “not a thing!” as CNET erases its history.

item.title: ディズニーは、Disney+ Premium、広告なしのHulu、ESPN+の米国での価格を引き上げ、Disney+の広告付きプランをカナダとヨーロッパ9カ国に拡大する予定だ（Todd Spangler/Variety）
item.description:
Todd Spangler / Variety:
Disney plans to raise US prices of Disney+ Premium, Hulu without ads, and ESPN+, and to expand Disney+ ad-supported plans to Canada and nine European countries  —  Ad-supported Disney+ tier to expand to Canada, U.K. and eight other European countries this fall
